content: That smell...{短暂停} it should be this way... Yeee~? <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, I was just lookin' for stuff to make fertilizer with.
info: 云果小故事-瘦弱果子后闲聊_云果故事线

content: I actually have enough for this passion fruit plant, but having a lickle more on hand won't hurt mah~! Don't forget to come see me <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>, mkay~?
